default.message: Buying bundles of 6 or 10 keys will also give free rewards to all online players, treat yourself and your friends!

points.heading: 50% Bonus Skills XP
points.subtext: Progress up the skill tree 50% faster!

points.heading: 50% Bonus Job Pay & XP
points.subtext: Earn 50% more money and job xp!

points.heading: Fly in Claims
points.subtext: /fly Free flight and no fall damage while in the borders of your own claims!

points.heading: Bottle Experience Points
points.subtext: Convert all your exp into bottles with a single command!

points.heading: Instant Access Commands
points.subtext: Anvil, grindstone, cartographytable, loom, smithingtable, and stonecutter!

points.heading: Set Pwarp Icons
points.subtext: Make your pwarp stand out with custom icons!

points.heading: Nickname & Prefix
points.subtext: /nickname Customize your title with a premium prefix and nickname with hex codes!

points.heading: Particle Trails
points.subtext: Deck yourself out with this super over-the-top status symbol. Leave a trail everywhere you go, you'll turn heads with this effect.

points.heading: Hide Armor
points.subtext: /togglearmor Show off your skin without leaving yourself vulnerable!

points.heading: Premium Role
points.subtext: Allows you to send messages to players on Minecraft through the #in-game channel!
